channel.title: Triad Wars (aka Sleeping Dogs Online)
channel.description:
also known as WHAT IS THIS SHIT AND WHERE'S SLEEPING DOGS 2?!
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0k_GRjGW4QE[/url]
[url]https://www.triadwars.com/[/url]
This might be a fun game nevertheless, but this is also a sign of things to come from Square Enix. There's also the rumor that Just Cause 3 might be an online-only game.
I don't want a future where all these good open world games from Square Enix all just have online-only sequels...

item.title: Triad Wars (aka Sleeping Dogs Online)

item.description:
If there is one thing square enix is good at lately its fucking up.

item.title: Triad Wars (aka Sleeping Dogs Online)
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I signed up for the beta but I’m very disappointed and unless it’s really good I can’t see myself playing it much. Also I find it weird that it’s PC only when something like this would work fine on consoles.

Read full topic

item.title: Triad Wars (aka Sleeping Dogs Online)
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
also known as WHAT IS THIS SHIT AND WHERE’S SLEEPING DOGS 2?!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0k_GRjGW4QE

https://www.triadwars.com/

This might be a fun game nevertheless, but this is also a sign of things to come from Square Enix. There’s also the rumor that Just Cause 3 might be an online-only game.

I don’t want a future where all these good open world games from Square Enix all just have online-only sequels…

Read full topic
